dct_title_s: New [Alpochester?] :is situated on the south bend of the Kalamazoo River at the mouth of Pine Creek.
dct_alternative_sm: New [Alpochester?] : is situated on the south bend of the Kalamazoo River at the mouth of Pine Creek.
dct_description_sm: Possibly shows the village of New Rochester (aka Sherwood's Mills), previously located near Otsego, Michigan.
On verso: From original manuscript on cowhide [deerskin] - courtesy Mich. Hist. Coll. which borrowed the map from private owner 3/20/42.
dcat_keyword_sm: Real property Michigan New Rochester Maps.
dct_rights_sm: This map is in the public domain.
dct_rightsHolder_sm: Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library. https://www.lib.umich.edu/about-us/policies/copyright-policy
